name: JACK THE REPAIR
description:
TWO CONTROLLERS REQUIRED

Any controller with joysticks (PS4, Xbox...) should work.

CONCEPT

JACK THE REPAIR is a 2-players coop game.

Avoid JACK at all cost and collect the five robot parts, then reach the exit.

TOOLS

Made with Unity 2019.3 for the Global Game Jam 2020.

CREDITS

Karl FAYETON - GD, Dev

Thibaud BALMAIN - LD, 2D/3D Artist

Matthieu RAUBER & Alexandre TOURRIER - Sound design
